thread.title: Police: DeSoto County constable charged with DUI
thread.title_full: Police: DeSoto County constable charged with DUI - FOX 8 WVUE New Orleans News, Weather, Sports, Social

author: cbs8
title: Police: DeSoto County constable charged with DUI
text:
HORN LAKE, Miss. (AP) - Lake Horn police say a Desoto County constable has been charged with DUI after being stopped for speeding.
Sgt. Travis Ladd tells The Commercial Appeal ( http://bit.ly/1Vxdfrj ) bond for Christopher Plumlee, who represents District 2, was set at $1,600.
Police did not provide other details on Plumlee's arrest Saturday night.
DeSoto County has five constables, who are elected officials responsible for serving court orders and who have the power to make arrests.
Information from: The Commercial Appeal, http://www.commercialappeal.com
